text:
#Quinoline #neurotoxicity 

#Canada trialed #Chloroquine for #covid19Canada and failed in spectacular fashion. 

The disabling #neurotoxic effects of #quinism is only now becoming widely acknowledged and legal battles such as our #MefloquineMassTort march on in increasing tempo: https://t.co/RBQp4qxPnM https://t.co/OzpDutyBQX
